Title: I Only Have Eyes for You
Plot: As the Sadie Hawkins Dance nears, Buffy faces inner demons as she feels responsible for Angel's epiphany, meanwhile Sunnydale High is even more dangerous than usual as the ghost of a former student who killed his sweetheart and then committed suicide haunts the halls forcing people to relive the moments that killed them over and over.
GuestStars: Miriam Flynn, Brian Poth, Sarah Bibb, James Lurie, Ryan Taszreak, Anna Coman-Hidy, Vanessa Bednar, John Hawkes, Meredith Salenger, Christopher Gorham, Brian Reddy, James Marsters, Juliet Landau, Armin Shimerman
